sentence.Network_en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
sentence.Network_cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

sentence.Network_en: Pulling out of a recession is a lengthy and drawn-out process.
sentence.Network_cn: 从经济衰退中走出来需要漫长的过程。

sentence.Network_en: A long drawn out war would likely deepen and prolong the recession.
sentence.Network_cn: 一场旷日持久的战争很可能会使衰退程度加剧，时间延长。

entry.def: You can describe something as drawn-out when it lasts or takes longer than you would like it to.

example.ex: Pulling out of a recession is a lengthy and drawn-out process...
example.tran: 从经济衰退中走出来需要漫长的过程。

example.ex: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
example.tran: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

means.word_mean: 1. relatively long in duration; tediously protracted;
2. (used of speech) uttered slowly with prolonged vowels
